mapper.insert: insert into ba_urinalysis_photo (id, urinalysis_id, url, created_time,op_pid,op_user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{urinalysisId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{opPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ba_urinalysis_photo
id,
urinalysis_id,

created_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update ba_urinalysis_photo
urinalysis_id = #{urinalysisId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select bup.*,bs.uuid,bs.area_id areaId from ba_urinalysis_photo bup left JOIN ba_urinalysis bu on bu.id = bup.urinalysis_id left JOIN ba_serial bs on bu.serial_id = bs.id where bup.urinalysis_id = #{urinalysisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
